title: Tamed A Blackened S*ave Man - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Different Social Status   Early Romance   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Revenge   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Identity   Secrets   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Strong Love Interests
author: 보랏빛마을
description:
In the future, I succeeded in taking the man who would become the best in swordsmanship, one step ahead of the Prince and enlisting him as my younger brother.

I treat my younger brother, which is not blood related to me, more kind than anyone else, and I fed him well and raised him well. 

He will be my younger brother who will protect me from the damn fiance who killed me in my previous life, and will be the replacement to go to war on my father’s behalf.

“I have never thought of you as a family from the moment I first saw you.” 

“My dear sister.”

His eyes, filled with possessive desires, shone.

It was a beast that I brought as my younger brother.>
